text: Lisa Kennedy Montgomery (stage name: Kennedy; born September 8, 1972) is an American political satirist, radio personality and former MTV hostess. She hosted Alternative Nation from 1992 to 1997. Kennedy Montgomery was born in Indianapolis, Indiana. ==References== Category:American television personalities Category:American radio personalities Category:Writers from Indianapolis Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:American political commentators Category:American LGBT rights activists
title: Kennedy (commentator)
